channel.title: life on Vinay Hiremath
channel.description: Recent content in life on Vinay Hiremath

item.title: Belonging
item.description: Note: This isn’t the type of post I expected to write when setting up this blog, but given the extraordinarily long hiatus since my last post and nonexistent readership (most posts are primarily written to help me structure my thoughts), it seems as worthy as any. Moments devoid of thought are often scarce in a world dominated by notifications and messages from seemingly every direction, but I am regularly impressed by their value.
